parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower ball joint can cause the wheel to detach from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The wheel detaches from the vehicle
the vehicle collapses on one side
the steering wheel feels loose
the vehicle sways from side to side
a clunking noise is heard from the front of the vehicle
the vehicle is unable to move.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate repair of the lower ball joint can lead to continued failure of the component, causing accidents and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The dealer refuses to repair the vehicle
the dealer claims the vehicle is not part of the recall
the dealer charges the consumer for recall repairs
the dealer fails to inspect the vehicle properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities, as the occupants are not protected from the impact.
symptoms: The airbag does not deploy in a crash
resulting in injuries to the driver and/or passengers
including head
back
shoulder
and knee injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The ABS light turns on
the brake pedal becomes difficult to press
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
the brakes make a grinding noise
the brakes lock up
and the vehicle vibrates or shakes while braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped or failed brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate or shake while braking, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: The brake rotors warp
the brakes vibrate or shake while braking
the brake pads and rotors need to be replaced frequently
and the vehicle experiences poor brake performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
the brake pedal does not return to its normal position
and the brakes make a grinding noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake hydraulic system can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brakes make a grinding noise
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal sticks to the floor
and the brakes lock up.
